about.heroSubtitle1: Building scalable apps for web & mobile
about.heroSubtitle2: I'm a seasoned CEO and Full Stack Developer with 11+ years of experience transforming innovative ideas into robust, scalable solutions. My expertise spans modern web technologies, mobile app development, AI/ML integration, and strategic project management.
about.heroSubtitle3: My approach combines technical excellence with business acumen, ensuring every project not only meets technical requirements but drives real business value. I believe in empowering teams, writing clean maintainable code, and building products that make a lasting impact.
